Minneapolis.Hennepin History Museum:
Hennepin History Museum is a museum dedicated to the history people and communities of Hennepin County, Minnesota. The museum provides in house exhibits, history-themed programming, and social events throughout the year.


== Location ==
The museum is located in the Whittier neighborhood of Minneapolis in the historic Christian Family Mansion, a historic home, built in 1919 in what was then the Washburn-Fair Oaks Mansion District of Minneapolis.
